alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 3:31PM CDT until May 22 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 331 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Ware, or 19 miles north of Dalhart, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ware. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
